summary: Frontend testing completed for Milkbites e-commerce bakery platform. Theme successfully updated to sky blue/black/white/blue. All major features tested and working. Minor Indonesian text 'GRATIS' found and fixed to 'FREE'.

minor.issue: Failed to load data error shown on Discounts tab - may be empty data or API issue

seed_data_creation: Created test customer account during signup testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. Theme is sky blue. All text is in English. Admin dashboard has Orders, Products, Discounts tabs. Customer dashboard has My Orders, Addresses, Profile tabs. Cart and checkout flow working correctly.

homepage.details: Sky blue theme applied correctly, hero section visible, category tabs working, featured products displayed

burger_menu.details: Opens and closes properly on mobile view, shows category links

category_tabs.details: All 4 tabs (Cookies, Babka, Cake, Hampers) work and filter products correctly

login_page.details: Displays in English, login works with valid credentials

signup_page.details: Displays in English, signup creates account and redirects to homepage

admin_login.details: Displays in English, admin login works with provided credentials

admin_dashboard.details: Orders, Products, Discounts tabs all work. All text in English.

customer_dashboard.details: My Orders, Addresses, Profile tabs all work. All text in English.

cart_functionality.details: Add to cart works, cart page displays correctly with Order Summary

checkout_page.details: Delivery and Pickup options work, all text in English (fixed GRATIS to FREE)

english_translation.details: All user-facing text is in English. Fixed one Indonesian word 'GRATIS' to 'FREE'.
